snippet.title: Vlad Circus Descend Into Madness - Exclusive Trailer | Black Summer 2023
snippet.description:
Check out this exclusive trailer for Vlad Circus: Descend into Madness, an upcoming pixel-art survival horror adventure set in the 1920s. Everything is not quite as it seems as we meet characters Oliver Mills, Dr. Nicholas Jasper, and more in this new trailer. Learn more about the game’s story and catch a peek at some combat from this mysterious psychological horror tale.

Vlad Circus: Descend into Madness challenges players to escape a labyrinth of nightmares and torment, solve mind-bending puzzles, and most importantly, survive! Vlad Circus: Descend into Madness is coming to PS5, Xbox Series X/S, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC via Steam and GOG.
